Report.Query: SELECT RUN_DATE as searchdate, ROUTE_ID as routeid, BUS_SELF_ID as busselfid, BUS_ID as busid, BUS_CARD as buscard, ISMANULOPT as isman, ISAPPEND as isapp, ARRLFT_FLAG as arrlf, STATION_ID as stationid, STATION_NAME as stationname, ACTDATETIME as actime, RECDATETIME as retime, SITE_NAME as sitename, AREA_CODE as areacode, ORG_GROUP as orgname, ORG_GROUP_ID as orgid, row_number() over (order by ROUTE_ID) as RowNumber, count(*) over () as TotalItems FROM RPT_BUSIQUERY_ARRLFT
